text: The 2016 Ligas Superiores, the fifth division of Peruvian football (soccer), will be played by variable number teams by Departament. The tournaments will be played on a home-and-away round-robin basis. ==Liga Superior de Lambayeque== ===Serie A=== ===Serie B=== ==Liga Superior de Piura== ===Serie A=== ===Serie B=== ===Semifinals=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=3|Teams !colspan=3|Scores |- !width="175"|1st leg home team !width="50"| !width="175"|2nd leg home team !width="50"|1st leg !width="50"|2nd leg ! |- |align=right|Asociación Comerciantes |0:6 |align=left|Atlético Grau |0–5 ||W.O. |– |- |align=right|Juana & Víctor |0:6 |align=left|San Antonio ||0–1 |0–2 |– |} ===Final=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=3|Teams !colspan=3|Scores |- !width="175"|1st leg home team !width="50"| !width="175"|2nd leg home team !width="50"|1st leg !width="50"|2nd leg ! |- |align=right|Atlético Grau |3:0 |align=left|San Antonio ||1–0 |– |– |- |} ==Liga Superior de Tumbes == ===Serie A=== ===Serie B=== ===Cuadrangular Final=== ==External links== * DeChalaca.com - copaperu.pe la información más completa del "fútbol macho" en todo el Perú 2016 5
title: 2016 Ligas Superiores del Peru
